borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: ARK Swift Primary AcademyAustralia RoadWhite City EstateLondonW12 7PT
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission (ref: 2020/00596/VAR) dated 30 June  2020, for Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), for minor material amendments to the original planning permission (ref:: 2017/04800/FUL) dated 18th December 2017; for Demolition of the existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to deliver a mixed use development; including 132 residential units (Use Class C3) and involving; a 5 storey building comprising a school (Use Class D1) with residential units above (Use Class C3); a 5 storey building comprising a replacement Nursery (Use Class D1), with residential units above (Use Class C3), 7 storey building comprising a replacement adult education centre (Use Class D1), with residential units above (Use Class C3), an 8 storey building containing residential units, (Use Class C3) with a restaurant/café unit at ground floor level (Use Class A1 and/or A3), a 9 storey Office building with ancillary ground floor restaurant/café (Use Class B1), a two storey building with rooftop MUGA, containing the new Youth Zone (Use Class D2), servicing, blue badge parking, cycle parking and new landscaped open space, including a new square. The changes include the repositioning of approved building footprints, alterations to the parapet heights, elevational design amendments, reconfiguration of the Volume C roof, removal of the internal servicing yard to Volume C and landscaping changes.Volume C Amendments to the landscaping of approved terrace to create enhanced external seating area for the Café and Co-Working space;  positioning and location of doors in response to the internal fit-out and proposed landscaping; Removal of three openable vents; Proposed rainwater pipe access hatches; Proposed smoke vent extraction fans and Proposed louvres to Level 9 curtain walling.
